<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sprite's Spark](/Feats.aspx?ID=2635) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sprite" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=238" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can fling a portion of your magic at foes. You gain a ranged unarmed attack in the [sling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=13) weapon group with a maximum range of 20 feet that deals 1d4 damage. (No ability modifier is added to the damage roll.) The damage type and name of the unarmed attack depends on your heritage, described below; most sprite heritages not presented in this book also use luminous spark. Like other unarmed attacks, you can improve this attack with [_handwraps of mighty blows_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=441). 

**[Draxie](/Heritages.aspx?ID=140)** euphoric spark (mental) 

**[Firefly Sprite](/Heritages.aspx?ID=142)** luminous spark (fire) 

**[Grig](/Heritages.aspx?ID=141)** dissonant note (sonic) 

**[Melixie](/Heritages.aspx?ID=143)** sting shot (poison) 

**[Nyktera](/Heritages.aspx?ID=144)** ultrasonic pulse (sonic) 

**[Pixie](/Heritages.aspx?ID=145)** pixie dust (mental)
name: Sprite's Spark
